Products.ProductName: Womens Halter Dress - Navy Blue - 3XL
Products.ProductDescription_AbovePricing: Feminine and flowing sun protection is yours in this certified UPF 50+ Halter Dress. This stylish dress features modest front stitching to ensure coverage stays put. Hidden side zipper and 4-way stretch ensure a perfect and flattering fit. Pair this stylish dress with our Seaside Shrug to complete this sun safe look!
Products.TechSpecs:
• Soft, lightweight, breathable pique fabric
  • Ties at neck
  • Hidden side zipper
  • Contrasting color band above waist
  • Removable halter padding
  • Slight slits at bottom for increased mobility
  • Certified UPF 50+
  • Chlorine and salt water resistant

Products.ProductNameShort: Baby Girls Long Sleeve Sun & Swim Shirts
Products.ProductDescription_AbovePricing: Weâ€™ve taken the greasy mess out of applying sun protection with our adorable fun filled vibrant colored UV protection swim shirts. Made from our soft and breathable stretch knit sun fabrics with full garment flat lock seams for ease and comfort. Less sunscreen to apply means more play time for baby and less worry for parents! Chlorine and salt water resistant. Certified UPF 50+.

  • Lightweight, Quick Drying Microfibre Knit

  • Relaxed Fit

Products.ProductName: Womens Ruched Tank Top
Products.METATAG_Description: This Women's Ruched Tank Top is an essential piece for any wardrobe. It works perfectly both in and out of the water. Order yours online from UV Skinz today!
Products.METATAG_Title: Ruched Tank Top | Womens SPF Shirts | Ruched Top
Products.ProductFeatures:
Sun protection has never looked so flattering. Our Ruched Tank Top is an essential piece to any wardrobe that is perfect in or out of the water. Ruching side detail contours to your body for a slimming fit. Internal shelf bra with removable padding provide just the right amount of support. Certified UPF 50+.

 

  • Certified UPF 50+
  • Chlorine and Salt Water Resistant
  • Quick Drying, 4-Way Stretch, Swim Knit Sun Fabric
  • Our Swim Knit Sun Fabric Moves with You
  • Adjustable Ruching Side Detail
  • Crisscross Straps
  • Internal Shelf Bra with Removable Padding
  • Flat-lock Seams
  • Body Length for Size M is 25 1/2" as Measured from Side Neck to Hem
  • Easy Care: Machine Wash, Line Dry
  • Imported

Products.ProductName: Mens Full Zip Water Jacket
Products.METATAG_Description: Stylish, lightweight, and UPF 50+ rated, this men's water jacket can be worn on the water or during any outdoor activity. Buy this zip up waterproof jacket today!
Products.METATAG_Title: Mens Water Jacket | Navy Blue Zip Up Waterproof Jacket
Products.ProductFeatures:
Our Menâ€™s Full Zip Water Jacket is stylish, lightweight, and has a certified UPF rating of 50+ (the highest available!). Wear the zip up waterproof jacket hiking, kayaking, rafting, and during any other outdoor water sport for advanced sun protection and maximum comfort. Our technical fabric is quick drying, breathable, and resistant to chlorine and salt water.

 

  • Certified UPF 50+
  • Chlorine and Salt Water Resistant
  • Light Weight and Quick Drying
  • Shape Retaining, Four-Way Stretch
  • Contrasting Color Panels
  • High Neck Collar
  • Optional Thumbholes for Additional Hand Protection
  • Side Pockets
  • Body Length for Size L is 29 1/2" as Measured from Side Neck to Hem
  • Easy Care: Machine Wash, Line Dry
  • Imported

Products.ProductName: Mens Coastal Resort Pants
Products.METATAG_Description: Our casual resort wear, including our Menâ€™s Coastal Resort Pants, can be worn anywhere. Buy these lightweight and comfortable pants for your next vacation.
Products.METATAG_Title: Resort Wear Mens | Casual Resort Pants | UV Skinz
Products.ProductFeatures:
Perfect for the adventurous guy on the go. Our Menâ€™s Coastal Resort Pants are incredibly lightweight and comfortable, and can be worn anywhere! These resort pants provide lasting sun protection whether taking a stroll on the beach, playing a round of golf, or a fun night out on the town. Inseam 32". Casual resort pants are certified UPF 50+.

 

  • Certified UPF 50+
  • Chlorine and Salt Water Resistant
  • Lightweight, Quick Drying Sun Fabric
  • 2 Thigh Pockets
  • Size 36 Inseam: 32"
  • Easy Care: Machine Wash, Line Dry
  • Imported

Products.ProductName: Mens Flap Hat
Products.METATAG_Description: Order your sun hats for men from UVskinz.com! This Adult Flap Hat features a retractable flap at the back of the neck providing additional sun protection.
Products.METATAG_Title: Mens Flap Hats | Mens Sun Hat with Neck Flap | UPF Hat
Products.ProductFeatures:
A versatile spin on our Bucket Hat, our Adult Flap Hat features a retractable flap at the back of the neck providing additional sun protection that can be easily rolled up and tucked away when no longer needed. Our men's sun hat with neck flap has an internal mesh lining and wicking sweatband to provide the ultimate comfort and breathability. Standard UPF 50+ rating ensures maximum UV protection.

 

  • Certified UPF 50+
  • Chlorine and Salt Water Resistant
  • Lightweight and Quick Drying
  • Optional Neck Flap
  • Integrated Wicking Sweatband
  • Internal Mesh Lining for Ventilation
  • Cinch at Crown for Custom Fit
  • Imported
Products.TechSpecs:

Wide Brim Field Hat
Products.METATAG_Description: If you are looking for advanced sun protection in a hat, look no further! Order your sun protective wide brim field hat online from UVSkinz.com.
Products.METATAG_Title: Wide Brim Field Hat | Sun Protection Hat | UV Skinz
Products.ProductFeatures:
If youâ€™re looking for advanced sun protection in a hat, look no further! Our Wide Brim Field Hat is perfect for all your outdoor activities, with a UPF rating of 50+: ensuring protection against 98% of UVA and UVB radiation. Featuring slipstream venting for breathability, a wicking sweatband for comfort, and an interior crown pocket to store small essentials, this wide brim field hat has everything you need for sun protection and comfort on the go. Certified UPF 50+.

 

  • Certified UPF 50+
  • Slipstream Venting Along Exterior Headband
  • Water Repellent and Stain Resistant
  • Integrated Wicking Sweatband
  • Packable
  • Stowaway Interior Crown Pocket
  • Chinstrap with Cord Lock
  • Adjustable Sizing Custom Fits Most Adults
  • Imported
